description: This file defines a React functional component 'Layout' that composes the main layout of an educational platform, including a navbar, optional sidebar drawer for course sections, main content area, and footer. It manages UI state for toggling the sidebar visibility and applies inline styles for layout and appearance.

methods.name: Layout({ children })
methods.description: React functional component that renders the app layout with a top navbar, toggleable sidebar for courses/sections, main content area, and footer.
